mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName} (trans_hash, trans_from, trans_to, block_number, block_timestamp, create_time, modify_time, gas_used, status, extra_data, app_id) VALUES (#{trans.transHash}, #{trans.transFrom}, #{trans.transTo}, #{trans.blockNumber}, #{trans.blockTimestamp}, NOW(), NOW(), #{trans.gasUsed}, #{trans.status}, #{trans.extraData}, #{trans.appId}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;
mapper.select: select * from ${tableName} where statistics_flag=1 order by block_number limit 2000
select max(block_number) as maxBlockNumber,min(block_number) as minBLockNumber from ${tableName}
mapper.delete: WITH rows_to_delete AS (SELECT * FROM ${tableName} WHERE statistics_flag = 2 AND block_number <= (SELECT max(block_number) FROM tb_trans_daily WHERE group_id = #{groupId}) ORDER BY block_number LIMIT ${subTransNum}) DELETE FROM ${tableName} t USING rows_to_delete r WHERE t.block_number = r.block_number AND t.statistics_flag = r.statistics_flag;
